section.title: Key Features
section.para:
First, it pursues an open and flexible structure to respond to various situations in the site project.
Uses a platform that adds functions in a plugin format (OSGi Bundle) to enable flexible response to additional function requests at site.
Can be integrated with Oden in command format through Http protocol, so it can be conveniently integrated with the previous transfer system.

Second, it supports various forms of deployment methods.
Entire deployment
Changed item deployment

Third, provides various additional functions or guidelines related to deployment.
History search
Server match validation

Fourth, guarantees stable performance to apply to various deployment environments.
Provides stable deployment for a large amount of items
Reduces physical disk I/O to secure speed

Fifth, provides various interface.
Deployment execution or monitoring through CLI environment
Deployment execution or monitoring through Web UI
